00024 #ifndef __BINARYVALUE_H_
00025 #define __BINARYVALUE_H_
00026 
00027 #include <omnetpp.h>
00028 
00029 class BinaryValue : public std::vector<char>, public cPolymorphic {
00030   public:
00031     static const BinaryValue UNSPECIFIED_VALUE;
00032 
00033     BinaryValue(const char* s="");
00034     BinaryValue(const std::string& str);
00035     BinaryValue(const std::vector<char>& v);
00036     BinaryValue(size_t n);
00037     BinaryValue(const char *b, const char *e);
00038     bool operator<(const BinaryValue& rhs);
00039     BinaryValue& operator+=(const BinaryValue& rhs);
00040 
00041     virtual ~BinaryValue() {};
00042 
00043     friend std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream& os, const BinaryValue& v);
00044 
00045     virtual void netPack(cCommBuffer *b);
00046     virtual void netUnpack(cCommBuffer *b);
00047 
00048     bool isUnspecified() const;
00049 };
00050 
00051 inline void doPacking(cCommBuffer *b, BinaryValue& obj) {obj.netPack(b);}
00052 inline void doUnpacking(cCommBuffer *b, BinaryValue& obj) {obj.netUnpack(b);}
00053 
00054 #endif
